work.work-title: Break, day of God, O break

encoding.software: PDFtoMusic Pro v1.6.5 Build 1B9E7 (c) Myriad - http://www.myriad-online.com

credit.credit-words: Break, day of God, O break
Break, day of God, Oh break, Like to the days above! Let purity awake, And faith, and hope, and love: But lo! we see the brightening sky; The golden morn is drawing nigh.

direction-type.words: Break, day of God, Oh break!
The earth with strife is worn;
Break, day of God, sweet day
And bid the shout of warriors
